      Soccer
      In Photos | UCSB vs. Cal Poly Soccer
      October 7, 2019 by Daily Nexus Photography

      UCSB trounced its rival Cal Poly on Saturday night, in what was a dominant 3-1 victory that pushed the Gauchos win streak up to seven.

      Check out the highlights of the game captured by Nexus photographers in the gallery below:

            May 21 - June 20

            June 21 - July 22

            July 23 - August 22

          • Virgo
            August 23 - September 22
